EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Contact__c}'s {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Publication_Year__c} Five Star Wealth Manager Award Candidate Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.PersonAssistantName},
Just wanted to follow up with our conversation on the phone and provide you with some additional information and a link to {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c}'s candidate form. {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c} has been identified as a candidate for the 2016 Five Star Wealth Manager Award award. Being selected as an award winner allows {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c} to be recognized in this special {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Month__c} issue of {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c} at no cost. In order to be considered for the award, candidates must complete the short online evaluation form.
To complete the online form, please click on the personalized link below:
Please click here to complete your candidate form.
The deadline for submission is 11:59 PM Eastern Time on {!Opportunity.CloseDate}. Award winners are scheduled to be notified within 5-6 weeks of the deadline. If you or {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c} have any questions please feel free to give me a call or send me an email.
Thanks,
{!User.Name} Research Representative
Five Star Professional 2900 Lone Oak Parkway Suite 120 Eagan, MN 55121 Direct: {!User.Phone} Main: 1-888-438-5782 Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} http://www.fivestarprofessional.com
We exist to define and promote professional excellence.
Reminder: Third party firms may have contacted you suggesting you are an award winner and offering you wall plaques or other products. These firms are in no way affiliated with Five Star Professional.
Only Five Star Professional can name you a Five Star award winner and provide official award-related products and services. Marketing organizations not affiliated with Five Star Professional do not comply with industry regulatory requirements and may be violating trademarks or copyrights.
